q: AP Pro Football Writer DALLAS( AP)- NFL Commissioner Roger Goodell is not concerned about Michael Vick being billed as hosting a Super Bowl party because the Eagles quarterback told him it's not true. He has said that on numerous occasions people have been using his name about being involved in some type of a party and he had no intention of participating in that, Roger Goodell said. The first couple minutes I thought my heart was going to jump out of my chest, said Allen Iverson , who in 31 minutes also handed out five assists and collected four rebounds. , Egypt's antiquities chief, toured the complex yesterday and expressed confidence it was sufficiently protected. Mr Zahi Hawass , who was appointed minister of state antiquities yesterday as part of the cabinet reshuffle, said: If the museum is safe, Egypt is safe. Looters were able to break into the museum on Friday, ripping the heads off two mummies and damaging about 75 small artefacts before soldiers caught them. Mr Zahi Hawass said the broken artefacts could be restored.
